attributes.comment:
Castle Connolly Top Doctors supports the development of a National Directory of Healthcare Providers & Services (NDH). As the publisher of Castle Connolly Top Doctors, the largest network of peer-nominated physicians, we know first hand the challenges inherent in maintaining an accurate and up to date physician directory. Currently, Castle Connolly Top Doctors represent 63,000 doctors (the top 7 percent of doctors in the nation), who are all peer nominated and thoroughly validated by Castle Connolly’s research team to ensure that they deliver the highest quality patient care. We thoroughly check each doctor's professional qualifications, education, hospital and faculty appointments, research leadership, professional reputation, disciplinary history and if available, outcomes data. With a National Directory of Healthcare Providers & Services, consumers could use Castle Connolly’s network to identify the Top Doctor, and then validate the contact and insurance information and other details at NDH.

For the past 30 years, Castle Connolly's mission has been to help people find the best healthcare and connect patients with best-in-class healthcare providers. We believe that the NDH will help us get closer to this goal. Thank you.
